name: User Goals API
description: This will deploy a sample api based on a prototype schema for a user/goals system by Ben Darlow. Additionally it will create a 3scale account.

THREESCALE_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Email address for the admin user of the account that will be created in 3scale

SUBDOMAIN.description: Your chosen subdomain for your 3scale admin portal (e.g. if example, admin portal will be at apistrat-example-admin.3scale.net). If none is chose, ORG_NAME will be used.
